DOC.brief_summary: The aim study test whether ivabradine able reduce cardiovascular event give patient coronary artery disease impair heart function .
DOC.brief_title: The BEAUTIFUL Study : Effects Ivabradine Patients With Stable Coronary Artery Disease Left Ventricular Systolic Dysfunction
DOC.criteria: Coronary artery disease Left ventricular systolic dysfunction Sinus rhythm : heart rate ( HR ) > = 60 beat per minute ( bpm ) Unstable cardiovascular condition Severe congestive heart failure
